Move Yo’ Feet disabled! (5 rounds cooldown)
{colour_start|buff}Free Action{colour_end} First use: Gets Possesed by otherwordly entities. Takes 10 Stress per turn
{colour_start|buff}Free Action{colour_end} Second use: The Possesion wears off
When Possesed: +2 BASE DMG +9 Dodge +10 ACC
When Possesed: +3 BASE DMG +10 Dodge +15 ACC
When Possesed: +4 BASE DMG +11 Dodge +20 ACC
When Possesed: +5 BASE DMG +12 Dodge +25 ACC
When Possesed: +6 BASE DMG +13 Dodge +30 ACC
+5%% ACC Multiplier per 20 {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} (Max at 80)
{colour_start|debuff}Riposte{colour_end}: 70 ACC / -30%% DMG / 3%% CRIT

Life on the road has taught the Bluesman to always stay quick on his feet. His straight razor and musical talent are his best defense against ne'er do wells or scorned lover’s spouses. But thanks to a recent contract, he has some supernatural help as well.

The Bluesman’s only love is playing the Blues, making his harmonica his faithful mistress. Together the two croon a tune that all will dance to whether they want to or not. For his appearance, the Bluesman is dressed to impress in his Sunday’s Best, which allows him to move freely but with little protection.

Forever in a state of wanderlust, resting by a campfire is nothing new to The Bluesman. For his allies, he’s quick to play a song on his harmonica or even engage in a bit of flirtation. However, in his more somber moments the Bluesman will often reflect on past choices and current regrets.
A Deal With the Devil
A blind Bluesman has come to answer our call. Though it appears this man has enough foresight to be...running from something, but the poor devil is unaware that it’s closer than he realizes.

"Sunday’s Best"
Suit & Tie
Whiskey Bottle

Recording Contrat
A Married Woman's Ring
The Devil's Contract
"Blinded, heartbroken, & caught with my pants down..."
Bloody Bottle
My Right Eye
My Left Eye
Oriental Opium Pipe
Missing Record
The lost Devil's Record. The Bluesman is happy to have it back.
Uhm... hello?
How did you get that?
Penitent Prayer
May the Light forgive me for deals I have made.
May the Light forgive me for the sins I have practiced.
May I find redemption of my soul from The Crossroads
Tune Harmoinca
I won Ol' Monica here from a bet. Best thing I ever did.
<Whistles>
At the end of the day, I'll always be faithful to Ol' Monica.
S’okay Monica, I’ll fix you up sweetheart...
Silver Tongued Devil
I bet you lookin' fine as wine tonight...
I got me a bottle whiskey and two glasses, wanna share?
You makes my heart sing...
A Little Nightime Music
Remember this tune when times get hard...
I don't know how to use this.
I broke it...
This isn't mine...
The Devil's Record? Not mine.
REPLACEME
REPLACEME
REPLACEME
REPLACEME
REPLACEME
Time to pay the Devil's due...
I'll be singin' for the Devil soon.
I still have time to escape this Deal.
The Devil is gon' have to wait a bit longer.
Hurry up, before they ask for an encore!
A musician knows when to take a bow and leave!
Damn! Lost my footing there.
Oof! That knocked me into next week!
What the hell hit me?!
{colour_start|bleed}GOTTA KEEP YOU ALIVE BEFORE THE DEAL COMES DUE!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HEAR ALL EVIL, SEE ALL EVIL, DO ALL EVIL. (chuckles){colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}SPEAK OF THE DEVIL AND HE DOTH APPEAR!{colour_end}
Wha? I must've blacked out for a minute.
My head feels strange. What happened?
Ughhh... Wait, How did I get over here?
Her song is sweeter than sin!
She's music to my ears!
I hear the song of the sea!
Well, it was fun while it lasted...
I'm a travelin' man, sweetheart. Can't be tied down.
I already got another devil to deal with.
I f-feel the Devil's hand on my shoulder!
No! I ain't ready yet! Don't drag me down!
I see my soul burnin' in pits of Hell!
Heh, I figured it'd end like this. Can't cheat the Devil.
I can feel the flickerin' flames of damnation!
I'm not ready! PLEASE, I'M NOT READY!
The Devil hungers for my soul!
-{colour_start|bleed}I CAN FEEL YOUR FEAR RISING, BOY!{colour_end} - No! Please!
Was the Deal worth it? In the end?
W-will I turn into a demon when I get there?
I knew I should have paied more attention Sunday school...
I know they're gon' have me rotatin' on a spit.
It's not my fault! I don't deserve to be damned! Please!
I won't die a hero, but will I live long enough to see myself become...?
I may be a coward, but cowards live!
N-no! I have to live in order to break the Deal!
I'm blind! I should be in the back!
Y-you got this! (pats back)
I'm bowin' out!
I've got somethin' in my eye!
I dropped my cane!
AHHH! I thought you were a demon!
It's just a little stage fright!
Don't sneak up on me like that!
AHHH! There's something crawlin' on me!
I feel a claw on me!
H-has my luck finally run out?
D-did I hit anythin'?
Don't tell me you're goin' blind too?!
This is the Devil's work!
Don't worry, if you die you ain't goin' where I'm goin'.
I can't drag anyone's corpse back to the hamlet!
Quit stealin' me good luck. I neeed it!
I bet they were aimin' for me!
No! I ain't movin'!
Hey! You're the one that can see, you move!
I can sense him sulking in the shadows!
The worst part about being blind is that it's always dark...
You would've made the deal too had you been in my shoes.
No! Stay away from me! I need... quiet!
Leave me alone! I-I'm just gon' hum to myself.
Ah!!! Don't sneak up on a blind man!
I-I felt a talon run down my spine!
I-I know there's a demon in here!
Don't let them take me! Don't let them drag me under!
You tryin' to kill me? You tryin' to send me there early!?
The contract ain't due yet! I need more time!
I may be blind, but I won't let knife be buried in my back.
The Devil has my scent!
Idle hands are the Devil's tools. So where are your hands at!?
You make a deal with him too?! Was it to kill me off?!
Heh, I knew there was something shady about you.
Got your eyes on a blind man's back? Suspicious.
Tryin' to sneak up on a blind man? Coward.
I got eyes in the back of my head.
Think again, I ain't doin' nothin'!
Save your breath, before I steal it.
Hmm... How about no?
I'm savin' my skin first!
Just let me do my own thing!
Every man for himself!
Idle hands are the Devil's tools. So where are your hands at!?
Whoops, my cane slipped.
They'll stab us in the back if we turn and run!
I'm tryin' to keep my soul from the Devil, not hand it out!
If it's my time, I go out on my own terms!
See y'all in Hell, I'm sure it'll be very soon.
The Devil's makin' sure I fall.
Who knocked my hand?! Who was it!
When did you get so good? You make a deal too?
I guess you don't need me here at all!
My leg fell alseep.
I'm just gon' ignore you from now on.
I'll stick to what's in my flask.
If it ain't whiskey, I don't want it.
I'm only dealin' with the devil I do know...
No. I don't want to owe somethin' to anyone else!
If it ain't whiskey, I don't want it.
Yeah, the devil offered me that too.
The Devil's watchin'...
How about you open your eyes, huh?
Are thoses flames I feel from the campfire or from Hell?
Don't be loud! Trying to attract attention, eh?
You'd be jumpy all the time too, if you were blind!
Touch Monica again and I'll slice your hand off!
I'm too frazzled to play for anyone.
You can keep guessing my card tricks, there ain't no fun in sharing them.
I ain't hearin' nothin' you sayin'!
I've travelled alone enough to take care of myself.
Psh, spare me.
Hmm! I can smell the poison!
You really except a blind man to trust your cookin'?
{colour_start|bleed}WALKING AMOUNG THE DAMNED, EH?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}PERHAPS I DRAG YOUR FRIENDS DOWN WITH YOU, HMMM?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}Y'ALL DON'T KNOW WHAT HELL HAS IN STORE FOR YOU!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THIS ENTIRE QUEST IS A FOOL'S ERRAND!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU ACTUALLY THINK ANY OF YOU DESERVE REDEMPTION?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THERE ISN'T A DECENT SOUL AMOUNG YOU. IMPRESSIVE.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}SHHH...THE BLUESMAN IS SLEEPING...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOUR LIGHT WILL DIM BEFORE I DO.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}REDEMPTION IS BEYOND YOUR REACH.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}I SIT ON YOUR SHOULDER, OPPOISITE THE ANGEL.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}LET'S SEE WHAT THIS BASTARD'S MADE OF.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}I SIT ON YOUR SHOULDER, OPPOISITE THE ANGEL.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU ALL WILL DANCE TO MY TUNE.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}DO MY BIDDING.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}WHEN HAVE I EVER PLAYED FAIR?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}SHOW ME THAT BEAUTIFUL RED...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU NEVER TRULY KNOW ANYONE...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HMMM, I COULD USE MORE ILK LIKE YOU.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}KEEP HITTING UNTIL THE MEAT SHOWS.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}(CHUCKLES){colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}IS YOUR HOPE FINALLY WANING?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU DON'T EVEN KNOW OF *REAL* PAIN YET.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}A HIT DOG WILL EVENTUALLY HOLLER.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HMPH...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THIS DOESN'T CONCERN YOU.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THESE FLAMES REMIND ME OF HOME, HAHA!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}AFTER SITTING WITH YOU LOT, HELL IS TRULY OTHER PEOPLE.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HAVE YOU SAID YOUR BEDTIME PRAYERS?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YES...COME CLOSER WHY DON'T YOU...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}OH? ARE YOU IN THE MOOD TO MAKE A DEAL?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}IF I HELP YOU, YOU MUST GIVE ME SOMETHING ELSE IN RETURN.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HE'S INCAPATICATED AT THE MOMENT...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOUR BREATH SMELLS LIKE...DEATH.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}WHAT COULD YOU POSSIBLY GIVE ME THAT I DON'T ALREADY HAVE?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YES, KILL HIM! BRING THIS DEAL TO A CLOSE!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THIS IS JUST A TASTE OF WHAT DAMNATION AWAITS!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}SPEAK OF THE DEVIL...AND HE SHALL APPEAR!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}SEE YOU IN HELL, BLIND BOY!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}ARE YOU READY FOR THIS DEAL TO COME DUE?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU DON'T EVEN KNOW OF *REAL* PAIN YET.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}AND TO THINK YOU'RE ALL JUST SACKS OF BLOOD AND MEAT.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}IT'S NOT A VIRGIN SACRIFICE, BUT IT'LL DO.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}LOOK AT THIS FEAST FOR MAGGOTS!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}NOW LET THE CRIMSON FLOW!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}IT'S TIME FOR SLAUGHTER!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU ONLY DIE ONCE.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THIS IS YOUR FATE.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}MOVE FORWARD, DEAD MAN{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HMPH...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}PREPARE FOR YOUR SWAN SONG{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU THINK THIS SOUL IS YOURS ANYMORE?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}WHAT DO I CARE IF YOU BLEED?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOUR PAIN IS MY PLEASURE!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}NOW DO THE DEVIL'S BIDDING!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}PERHAPS I'LL COLLECT THE CONTRACT EARLY...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}LET EVERYONE SEE YOUR SIN.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HAHAHAHA....NO.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}IF THE BLUESMAN DIES, HE DIES.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THE DEVIL ALWAYS CHEATS.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}PERHAPS I'LL COLLECT THE CONTRACT EARLY!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}WHO KNEW THE MORTAL I BARGAINED WITH IS SO USELESS.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}USELESS SACK OF BONES!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}PERHAPS I'LL ASK FOR THEIR SOUL NEXT.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THE DEVIL'S LUCK!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}CARE FOR A DANCE IN THE PALE MOONLIGHT?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU DARE COMMAND ME TO MOVE?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}COULD BE HOLY WATER...CAN'T RISK IT.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}ACKKK! IT BURNS ME!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}IF THE BLUESMAN DIES, HE DIES.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOUR HANDS! IT BURNS ME!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}PSH! AS IF YOU COULD ASSIST THE DEVIL!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}ACKKK! IT BURNS ME!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}JUST SO YOU KNOW, THE FLAMES IN HELL BURN COLD.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}BIND AND STITCH YOUR WOUNDS NOW, THEY'LL BE OPEN AGAIN SOON.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YES, SLEEP. YOU'RE PERFECTLY SAFE HERE...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}IF I DO THIS FOR YOU, I WILL NOW OWN YOUR SOUL.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}ASK FOR THE DEVIL AND I WILL OBLIGE. (chuckles){colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}OF COURSE I CAN DO IT, ALL I ASK IS YOUR IMMORTAL SOUL.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}IF THE BLUESMAN COULD SPEAK, HE WOULD REFUSE.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}IT'S ALL A BAD DREAM...{colour_end}
IF I ACCEPT, WILL YOU ANSWER MY RIDDLE FIRST?
{colour_start|bleed}ACKK! IT TURNS TO ASH IN HIS MOUTH!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}LET ME GUESS? YOU SPIKED IT WITH HOLY WATER.{colour_end}
At least the Devil helped me, unlike y'all!
If I'm goin' to Hell, I'm takin' y'all with me!
I may be damned, but y'all are useless!
If y'all can't help me, then I'm only helpin' myself!
You better be watching when I save all of us... again.
Don't expect me to play at any of y'alls funeral.
I wouldn't give y'all an encore if you begged for it!
To think, I have to rely on the Devil more than y'all...
I'd replace your soul for mine in a heartbeat if the Devil let me!
Y'all owe me an expensive bottle of bourbon after this...
(sighs) Y'all are just so triflin'...
Just let the blind man through so I can clean this mess up!
'Scuse me, comin' through!
Out of the way! (mutters) A bunch'a Reubs...
I am tired of being in the back, let me take the lead of this show!
Didn't y'all want your time to shine? Then what are you waiting for?
Let me get my breath back.
Don’t take any wooden nickels!
Go chase yourself!
The rogue leaves the scene! Good luck.
Oh? Are you referin' to me now?
I can't be bothered...
What you want from a blind man, huh?
Quit it!
Not only am I blind, I'm suddenly deaf too!
Did someone call for an encore?
Y'all can't upstage me! Watch!
Watch this! And don't hold your applause!
This is what decades of training looks like.
At least the Devil knows true talent when he sees it!
Team! Where's my team?! I NEED HEALING!
I have saved your behinds countless times! Where's the gratitude?
HEY! Don't get blood on my suit!
This ain't the time to show off!
At least I won't die as the only screw-up.
And here I thought I was the blind one...
You broke my concentration.
You need MORE help? From ME? A musician needs his rest!
Put a tip in my hat and maybe I'll consider it.
Wake me again, and I'll play this harmonica till your ears bleed!
The folks in the tavern give better tips than y'all...
Someone pour me a stiff drink!
What's the point? The Deal's been made.
I'm just a damned man walkin'.
All that roamin' and nothin' but regret. Should I have found some roots?
This whole time, the swan song I've been singin'...was mine.
Maybe I should just punch my own ticket instead of delayin' the inevitable...
Maybe I should've listened to that Voodoo Witch...
How many times have I sang the Blues and heard nothin' from the Light.
I'm out of time...! I am definitely out of time!
I can't even think of one decent thing I've done for someone other than myself?
This is why I sing the Blues...sadness is all I know.
(sighs) Damned if I do, damned if I don't...
Maybe I should just punch my own ticket instead of delayin' the inevitable...
Y'all still have so much to see. (sad chuckle) Unlike me.
Maybe I can do one good thing before I perish.
I've been a candle burnin' at both ends. Time to snuff it out.
I have to go see a man about a dog...
My Deal was foolish, always have been, always in vain.
I'm just a foolish blind man...
I need a drink...
It's time I bowed out...
Give me a moment, please...
I need a drink...
I can't find my whiskey bottle...
The Devil's gon have me on a split...
Why? I am out of time.
I feel trapped...
One last breath...
One last performance...
The Deal has finally come due...
All I have left are the Blues...
All I have left are the Blues...
The Deal has finally come due...
I've been a candle burnin' at both ends. Time to snuff it out.
Maybe I should just punch my own ticket instead of delayin' the inevitable...
Retreat to where? The Devil's everywhere.
No. My time in Hell is due.
Just give me a light for my cigar...
All need is Monica and my whiskey...
Nah, just pour me a glass of whiskey...
Don't waste it, I'm beyond redemption.
The Devil won't allow it...
Leave me alone, help someone else.
... Please leave me be.
Can't anyone be left alone with their dark thoughts anymore?
These flames only remind me of the inevitable fate that awaits me.
What is there to know about a damned one like me?
I can only look forward to a reunion in the afterlife.
As if it would be of any help...
I've done terrible things... Have I been fooled by the Light...?
Why seek help from a failure?
I am damned beyond salvation.
N-no, I'm not crying. J-just rubbing my eyes.
I can't even play a tune. The music is beaten out of me.
Smells good, but I am not in the mood for it.
All I need is my whiskey.
{colour_start|bleed}I AM THE DEVIL AND I HAVE COME TO DO THE DEVIL'S WORK.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}BEFORE THE LIGHT, THERE WAS DARNKESS. AND BEFORE THAT, THERE WERE MONSTERS.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}WHAT'S WRONG? AFRIAD OF THE DEVIL'S GRIN?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HELL IS EMPTY AND ALL THE DEVILS ARE HERE.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}A DEVIL HAS NO POWER...EXCEPT IN THE DARK.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}DO YOU WISH TO DANCE UNDER THE PALE MOONLIGHT?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}IT'S SAINTS WHO ARE THE CYNICS AND DEMONS, THE OPTIMISTS.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOUR LONG ROAD IS PAVED WITH GOOD INTENTIONS...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU ALL WILL DANCE THE DEVIL'S JIG!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}I CANNOT DIE, I LIVE ON IN YOU!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}LET ME HAVE MY WAY WITH YOU.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}FORWARD, MY PUPPET.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}STEP FARTHER INTO THE ABYSS.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}OH HOW MY BLOOD BOILS!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HELL IS EMPTY AND ALL THE DEVILS ARE HERE.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THE DEVIL WILL ALWAYS CLAIMS HIS DUE.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}AND NOW FOR MY GREATEST TRICK...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}NOW TO SIT BACK AND ADMIRE MY WORK...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}NEUTRAL MEN ARE THE DEVIL'S ALLIES...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}I BECOME THE SNAKE ONCE AGAIN...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}AS IF YOU COMMAND MY FATE!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}QUIT YOUR MEDDLING!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}(EVIL CACKLING){colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HMM, WHAT HAVE WE HERE?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THE DEAL IS STRUCK!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}CARE FOR A GAME OF CHANCE? (chuckles){colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}LET'S SEE WHAT'S UP MY SLEEVE{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}AS IF YOU HAVE THE POWER TO COMMAND ME!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}WHAT A PECULIAR LOOK... (chortles){colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU ACT LIKE YOU HAVE A SLIVER OF A CHANCE...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}CARE TO TRY THE DEVIL'S LUCK?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YES! DESTROY THIS POSESSED MORTAL!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}I CAN SENSE YOUR SOUL IS DAMNED TOO!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOUR SOUL WILL SOON BE MINE!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HOW DARE YOU TRY TO CHEAT YOURSELF OUT OF THIS DEAL!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}SO THE BLUESMAN THOUGHT HE COULD CHEAT THE DEVIL, EH?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}NO, NO NO, LET'S SEE HOW THIS PLAYS OUT... (chortles){colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HAHA, NO! I PLAN ON MEETING ALL FOUR OF YOU VERY SOON!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}AH, NOT HIS FIRST MISSTEP.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HE REALLY IS BLIND, HA HA!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}PERHAPS I'LL STRIKE A DEAL WITH YOU INSTEAD!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}DO YOU HEAR MY VOICE IN YOUR EAR?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}LET US REVIEW YOUR FAILURES.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}OH, SO CLOSE, BUT NO CIGAR!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HMMM...NO.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}BLAME HIS DAMNED WALKING STICK.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}GET THAT HOLY WATER AWAY FROM ME.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}TRYING TO EXORCIZE ME WITH A TOTEM?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOUR EXORCISM WILL NOT WORK. HE BELONGS TO ME.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU CANNOT PURGE ME OUT OF HIM. A DEAL WAS STRUCK.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}TRYING AGAIN WITH YOUR FULTILE ATTEMPTS?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}ARE YOU CERTAIN YOU ALL AREN'T IN HELL ALREADY?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}EVERYONE IS SOMEONE ELSE'S DEVIL. HEH HEH...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}NOT ONLY IS HELL A PLACE, BUT ALSO A STATE OF MIND...{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}CARE FOR A LITTLE GIVE & TAKE?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}CARE TO MAKE A DEAL, HMMM?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}CARE FOR A BATTLE OF WITS?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}I SEE NO VALUE IN FEEDING HIM.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HE CAN STARVE FOR ALL I CARE.{colour_end}
I don't know about y'all, but I ain't dying today!]></entry> <entry id="bluesman+str_virtued_stalwart"><![CDATA[I've got my second wind and my harmonica in hand!
I'm doin' so good, I just might kiss myself!
I didn't come this far for nothin'!
I've got my second wind and my harmonica in hand!
Let me just take a quick swig. Ahh, much better!
Feels like I've got a song in my heart!
Okay, so maybe I actually care about you lot.
Maybe the Light might redeem a scoundral like me yet!
Never tell me the odds, I've come back from worse!
If this is my Swan Song, I'm going out with a standing ovation!
If I'm goin' to Hell, I'm goin' with clear conscience.
Never thought I'd be sharin' my whiskey, but here we are.
Take swig o' whiskey and then pass it around.
If we survive, this'll be a great inspiration for a song.
For once, the Devil is gonna be used for good!
You ready for an encore, Monica?
I feel in tune with the beat of my heart!
For a split second, I thought I had my sight back!
Keep in tune with beat! It'll help you focus.
Feel that blood pumpin' in your ears? Means you're alive!
The Devil be damned! I'm gon' find a way out of this Deal!
You hear that tune? Must be the song of angels!
Get ready for another round of applause!
I may sing the Blues, but I'm feelin' mighty good!
They're gon' be writin' ballards about me!
Just like a well tuned guitar!
They won't even know what hit 'em!
I feel like I took a swig from the finest bourbon!
Maybe the Light is lookin' out for me after all...
Sing the truth and shame the Devil!
The Devil be damned! I'm gon' find a way out of this Deal!
Me n' Monica are gon' giev you a real show!
I still sing the Blues, but I'm feelin' mighty good!
(takes a long drag from cigar)
Lemme pour some whiskey on it.
Take a long swig, this might hurt a bit.
You do know I'm blind, right?
Here's a new tune I've been workin' on. What do ya think?
You want to play a round of cards?
Every Blues song comes from pain, but let somethin' good come from it.
Remind me to buy you a round at the tavern after this.
Here's my lucky Ace card. It'll keep you safe.
Let me light you a cigar. It'll calm your nerves.
Whoops, didn't see ya there! (chortles)
Guess we didn't see eye to eye, heh heh...
Y'all gon' have Hell to pay!
Don't go easy on me just cause I'm blind. (chuckles)
Music to my ears!
My luck ain't run out yet!
